title: General Secretary
about: The General Secretary is responsible for overseeing the entire council and ensuring that all operations run smoothly. They are the primary point of contact between the council and the college authorities.
responsibilities: The General Secretary will be responsible for leading and coordinating all activities of the council.
They will oversee the work of the operations, finance, tech, and creative teams, and ensure that all events and initiatives are planned and executed efficiently.
skills: Excellent communication and leadership skills are essential for this role.
The candidate should also possess strong organizational and problem-solving abilities.
perks: The General Secretary will gain valuable leadership experience and will have the opportunity to work closely with the college authorities.
They will also receive a letter of appreciation at the end of their tenure.
